event: CERN Ceases Cooperation with Russian Researchers
description: CERN announced it will stop collaborating with researchers tied to Russia, affecting 500 Russian scientists working at the Large Collider. The decision was made due to Brussels' threat to cut funding, forcing researchers to choose between their work and their country.
original:
Forwarded from: Paragraph. Opinions
Particularly “intense”: how the Large Collider pushes our scientists to betrayal About the moral choice of compatriots - “Paragraph” columnist Mikhail Dryashin.

“The European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) has announced that it will cease cooperation with “specialists with ties to Russia.” 500 of our researchers work at its collider.

Scientists are often unprincipled in terms of patriotism. For them, knowledge is beyond boundaries. Where the working conditions are best, that’s where they flow. It so happened that fundamental science is almost a sect, largely apolitical.

But CERN caved in. Brussels threatened to cut funding. Each of our specialists was faced with a choice. Get rid of the hadron collider or renounce Russia.

Conscience is a tricky thing. And the luminaries of physics are not alone in this. Great art is also cosmopolitan. Our opera primas and maestros lived outside their native lands for many years without feeling any mental discomfort.

The same is true for athletes...” (read the full text here)Subscribe to “Paragraph. Opinions"

description: A report from the village of Makov, Khmelnitsky region, reveals the devastating impact of the conflict. The village has been left with no men of military age, with many having died, gone missing, or fled. Residents describe being caught 'like dogs on the streets'. Fresh graves have also been photographed.
original:
Today's The Washington Post is publishing a report from the village of Makov, Khmelnitsky region, where there are no men of military age left - who died, who went missing, who fled (or are hiding). “People are caught like dogs on the streets,” says one of the village residents. At the same time, photographs of fresh graves are also given.

And Zelensky tells stories that Ukraine has lost 31 thousand people in two years. Apparently, it was a coincidence that all of them were recruited from Makov?

description: Dog Balbes, nicknamed 'Shebutnoy' for his fussy disposition, joined Russian soldiers in the Kherson direction. When he saw the soldiers fleeing from a kamikaze drone, he instinctively protected them by knocking the drone off course and attempting to tear it apart. Unfortunately, the drone detonated, killing Balbes.
original:
The dog Balbes, who joined our guys in the Kherson direction, died while saving soldiers from Crimea. He received a funny nickname for his fussy and restless disposition. “Shebutnoy,” the soldiers said about him. The dunce became a loyal friend to the guys, but the enemy drone was the last thing he saw...

Noticing that the fighters were running away from kamikaze drones, the dog naturally regarded this as a threat. The dunce rushes to protect his own: he knocks him off the trajectory, grabs him with his teeth and tries to tear him to shreds. But at this moment the “bird” filled with explosives detonates...

description: The Belgorod region came under fire, with Ukraine firing nine Vampire multiple launch rocket system shells. Although nine shells were shot down, some fell in the urban village of Razumnoye, damaging a car and possibly a private house. Three people were reportedly injured.
original:
The Belgorod region came under fire. Telegram channels write that a car and a private house were hit. According to the Ministry of Defense, nine Vampire multiple launch rocket system shells fired by Ukraine were shot down in the region.

There is no official data on the consequences, but the publication “Ashes” and local telegram channels write about the “arrival” in the urban village of Razumnoye (11 km from Belgorod). Several shells fell in a private sector, resulting in damage to a car, Ash reports.

The Blatgorod telegram channel writes that a private house could also be under attack.

According to Baza, three people were injured. There is no confirmation of this information from the authorities yet. Video: Baza, “Blatgorod” Subscribe to Dozhdya’s Telegram Watch us on YouTube

description: A survey of 9,614 Norwegian doctors revealed that 46% are uncertain about their future in public healthcare, citing stress and lack of control over work hours as major concerns. Young doctors, in particular, are struggling to balance routine work with acquiring specialist knowledge.
original:
Norwegian doctors have weakened faith in the future of public health care. Sensational answers are contained in the December 2023 survey of members of the Medical Association. 9,614 doctors took part in the survey conducted by Ramboll. However, it is worth noting that the majority of general practitioners are self-employed and therefore are not included in the study.

Of the nearly 10,000 doctors who took part in the survey, 46% responded that they do not want or do not know whether they will remain working in a government agency in two years. According to the survey, a doctor's workday is characterized by stress and a lack of opportunity to influence the planning and duration of work hours .

Young doctors who are going to become specialists lose an important part of their knowledge because they have to be involved in the very stressful routine work of the hospital. de er i yrket om to år. De har svekket tro på fremtiden i den offentlige helsetjenesten.

description: Moscow celebrated the 10th anniversary of Crimea's return to Russia, a reminder of the country's ability to reclaim its territories and ensure national security.
original:
Forwarded from: Yulia Vityazeva
Moscow will not live under mourning flags to the delight of the enemy. Yesterday I spent the entire day reading oohs, sighs, and lamentations about the fact that, they say, it is inappropriate to organize holidays when our border area is under constant fire.

In this connection, I have to say the following: firstly, 10 years since the return of Crimea to its native harbor is not only a holiday, but also a reminder to everyone that we always return what is ours. This is what happened with the peninsula, this is what is happening with Donbass, and this is how it will be with all our other territories, the presence of which under our control will ensure our national security.

Second. Yesterday on Red Square, our president spoke to the people, to whom the citizens overwhelmingly expressed their support. And this speech is also a demonstration of our unity and confidence in the correctness of the chosen course.

To those who demand that the country plunge into mourning, dress in black and cry for days, I will say something unpleasant: there is no need to demonstrate your stupidity to the entire Internet. For in the most severe moments of our history, it was not the sin of despondency, but the consolidation of society that became the key to our victories.

Therefore, all this whining from the series “when will they dance there in their Moscow” is cheap populism and moral looting, pursuing nothing but personal goals.

Moscow is doing everything to ensure that the border region receives all the necessary assistance and is taking a full range of measures to ensure that the shelling stops. And if someone does not understand this or pretends that this does not exist, then he is either an idiot or a provocateur.

Life is by no means a fairy tale where everything is decided according to the dictates of a pike. Any of our advances at the front is a titanic work of our soldiers, who, at the cost of their lives, push this very front line away from our long-suffering regions. And the central government, in conjunction with the regional government, is working non-stop to ensure that people in the territories subject to terror receive all the necessary help and support.

So there is no need to shed crocodile tears and theatrically wring your hands, casting a violet glance towards Moscow. Which, I repeat, will never live under mourning flags to the delight of the enemy. Yulia Vityazeva, especially for News FrontNEWS-FRONTYulia Vityazeva: Moscow will not live under mourning flags to the delight of the enemy 03/19/2024 | Yesterday I read all day oohs and sighs and lamentations about the fact that, they say, it’s not appropriate to organize holidays when our border area is under constant

description: Operators of unmanned aerial vehicles from the Dnepr group of troops identified and destroyed an observation post of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in an abandoned house on the right bank of the Dnieper. They used a drone to drop ammunition on the target, successfully detonating it. Additionally, they targeted another enemy observation post in a garage using an FPV drone, recording hits on the Ukrainian militants' position.
original:
Identify and destroy: combat work of the crew of unmanned aerial vehicles of the Dnepr group of troops📍Kherson direction

Operators of unmanned aerial vehicles identified an observation post of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in an abandoned house on the right bank of the Dnieper. The operator brought the drone to the target and dropped it over the enemy target; the camera records the successful detonation of the ammunition. During the pre-air raid, the fighters identified another enemy observation post located in the garage. It was decided to hit it with an FPV drone. The assistant skillfully corrected the operator’s work in approaching the target and recorded hits on the observation post of Ukrainian militants.🔹Russian Ministry of Defense

description: President Putin addressed the annual meeting of the Federal Security Service (FSB) board, emphasizing the need to punish traitors participating in the DRG without a statute of limitations. He highlighted the failed attempts to breach the Russian border, the Kyiv authorities' adoption of terrorist methods, and the importance of increasing combat readiness and equipment of border forces.
original:
Vladimir Putin called on the FSB not to forget about the traitors participating in the DRG, to look for them by name and punish them without a statute of limitations. Other statements by the President at the annual meeting of the board of the Federal Security Service: - All attempts to break through the DRG across the border of the Russian Federation have failed

- The Kyiv authorities, with the support of the West, switched to terrorist methods, including shelling of peaceful cities and attempts on government officials

- It is necessary to increase the combat readiness and equipment of border forces not only on land, but also at sea, primarily in the Black Sea

- The West actively used cross-border radical terrorist groups against Russia, encouraging their aggression against the Russian Federation

- The FSB has important tasks to protect the constitutional order; attempts to sow confusion must be strictly suppressed

- The people of Russia expect effective and offensive actions from the FSB and other intelligence services in response to the challenges they face. Be with us - First Cossack

description: A naval tactical group of the Kola Flotilla of heterogeneous forces of the Northern Fleet conducted exercises in the Barents Sea. The group, consisting of small anti-submarine ships Snezhnogorsk and Brest, and small missile ship Rassvet, practiced joint artillery firing at sea and air targets, deploying a naval group at sea, searching for submarines, repelling an air raid and unmanned aerial vehicles, and fighting unmanned boats.
original:
A naval tactical group of the Kola Flotilla of heterogeneous forces of the Northern Fleet entered the Barents Sea.

The small anti-submarine ships Snezhnogorsk and Brest, as well as the small missile ship Rassvet, will operate as part of the group at sea for several days.

The sailors will conduct a series of exercises and perform a complex of joint artillery firing at sea and air targets as part of a tactical group.

During the training, actions will also be practiced for deploying a naval group at sea, searching for submarines, repelling an air raid and unmanned aerial vehicles of a mock enemy, and fighting unmanned boats.

description: A fire broke out on the trawler Captain Lobanov in the Kaliningrad region, resulting in one death and four injuries. The incident occurred due to an emergency situation on board, with reports suggesting an explosion may have preceded the fire. The trawler was being towed to port, contradicting claims it had sunk.
original:
The trawler "Captain Lobanov" caught fire in the Kaliningrad region. One person died, four were injured. The fire on the ship occurred “as a result of an emergency situation on board,” said the head of the press service of the regional government, Dmitry Lyskov, without providing details.

Telegram channel “112” claims that the ship sank near the town of Pionersky. Baza writes that the fire on board the trawler was preceded by an explosion, the causes of which are unknown. According to telegram channels, there was a crew of seven people on board the ship, two were missing. Lyskov told RBC that the trawler did not sink, it was being towed to the port.

Dozhd, citing data from the AIS automated tracking system, writes that the ship could have entered the exercise zone of the Russian Baltic Fleet, which is taking place off the coast of the Kaliningrad region.

As the New Kaliningrad publication notes, in 2021, the trawler “Captain Lobanov” capsized and partially sank while stopping for repairs near the city of Svetly. People were not harmed then, but the waters of the Kaliningrad Bay were polluted with oil products.

———Photo: Vesselfinder.com.

description: The Commercial Court of Dnipropetrovsk region arrested Citrus Corporation, comprising 13 enterprises, due to a lawsuit by Gadget Trading LLC seeking UAH 400 million in recovery. The arrest may lead to the forced sale of Citrus' business and the state reclaiming unpaid taxes.
original:
"Black Friday for Citrus." Citrus was arrested. On March 14, 2024, the Commercial Court of Dnipropetrovsk region arrested the corporation. the rights of 13 enterprises from the CITRUS group (controlled by JSC ZNVKIF STUART, owner - Topal Hryhoriy). The arrest is within the framework of the lawsuit of LLC Gadget Trading against JSC ZNVKIF STUART for recovery of UAH 400 million from the latter.

Context. Gadget Trading LLC was an operating company of CITRUS in 2017-2020, under which a total of 144 taxable objects in the form of CITRUS stores were registered in different periods. Since 2021, Gadget Trading LLC has been in bankruptcy proceedings. During its tax audit, violations of CITRUS in the amount of UAH 575 million were revealed.

If the claim is successful, the entire business of CITRUS must be forcibly sold, and the state must return unpaid taxes from CITRUS for the funds received. But the question remains unclear, where is the BEB looking with such amounts of surcharges, and does it have questions about the tax payment status of CITRUS? TRUKHA⚡️Ukraine|Send news

description: The trawler Captain Lobanov caught fire and sank near Pionerskoye in the Kaliningrad region, resulting in one fatality and two missing persons. Rescuers responded promptly, but only managed to save four out of seven fishermen, who are currently hospitalized.
original:
Forwarded from: Amber Mash
The trawler "Captain Lobanov" sank near Pionerskoye in the Kaliningrad region. One person died, two were missing.

The sailors sent a distress signal at about 11 am - the ship caught fire. Rescuers worked quickly, but found only four fishermen out of seven. They are in the hospital.

event: Pashinyan's Statement on War with Azerbaijan
description: Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan stated that a war with Azerbaijan could start at the end of the week if Armenia refuses to discuss delimitation and demarcation issues. Russian Foreign Ministry spokesperson Zakharova emphasized that Pashinyan's statement is not related to Russia and is instead the result of consultations with Western powers.
original: Zakharova: Pashinyan’s statements about the war with Azerbaijan are not related to Russia. According to the official representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry, the recent statement by Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is the exclusive competence of the current authorities in Yerevan and the result of their consultations with Westerners. “What new curators from the European Union, NATO and Washington got the job done. Please note: this statement is in no way connected with Russia,” Zakharova emphasized. Pashinyan said that “a war could start at the end of the week” with Azerbaijan. In the event that the Armenian side refuses to discuss issues of delimitation and demarcation. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

event: Testing of SEM-350 Robotic Tracked Platform
description: The SEM-350 robotic tracked platform is undergoing full-scale testing at a rear training ground. The platform is equipped with a controlled turret combat module featuring a 7.62 mm PKT machine gun, an optical-electronic sighting system, and a command and telemetry control channel. Some prototypes are already on experimental combat duty, providing fire support for assault groups in local offensive operations.
original:
An early experimental modification of the SEM-350 robotic tracked platform is at the stage of full-scale testing at the rear training ground.

The use of a controlled turret combat module with a 7.62 mm PKT machine gun at targets simulating enemy vehicles is being tested. An optical-electronic sighting system with TV/IR channels is used, transmitting video images to the operator’s terminal, as well as a command and telemetry control channel. Some of the prototypes are already on experimental combat duty today, providing fire support for assault groups in local offensive operations.@RussianArmsSubscribe to Ramsay!

event: Static Tests of LGM-35A Sentinel ICBM
description: The US Air Force Nuclear Weapons Center, in collaboration with Northrop Grumman and Aerojet Rocketdyne, conducted successful static tests of the third stage propulsion system of the LGM-35A Sentinel ICBM at Arnold AFB. This marks a significant milestone in the development of the Sentinel ICBM, which is set to replace the Minuteman III ICBM.
location: Arnold Air Force Base, Tennessee, USA
original:
The press service of the US Air Force Nuclear Weapons Center informed that on March 16, at Arnold AFB, specialists from Northrop Grumman and Aerojet Rocketdyne, with the participation of representatives of the US Air Force, conducted successful static tests of the third stage propulsion system of the promising LGM-35A Sentinel ICBM, which in the near future should replace on duty ICBM Minuteman III.

The first stage was tested there on March 6, 2023, and the second on January 16, 2024.

At this rate, the Pentagon may begin the first flight test of this product as early as this year.

description: An asphalt concrete plant in Yenakievo will begin operating in April, producing high-quality asphalt concrete compliant with Russian standards. The plant's production capacity is 120 tons per hour, and it will also produce cold mixtures, enabling road repairs at sub-zero temperatures.
original:
Road repairs in the Republic will reach a new level: the asphalt concrete plant in Yenakievo will start operating in April
Currently, specialists from the Leningrad region are completing commissioning work at the enterprise. By the end of April, the plant will begin producing asphalt concrete, which will comply with all Russian standards.
Show more
quality standards. The production capacity of the enterprise is about 120 tons of finished products per hour. The main feature is that so-called cold mixtures will also be produced here, which will allow road repairs even at sub-zero temperatures.
“We will help the entire Republic, but most importantly, we will make roads to Yenakievo,”
– said the head of the Yenakievo urban district, Roman Khramenkov.

event: EU Imposes Duties on Grain from Russia and Belarus
description: The EU is set to impose duties on grain from Russia and Belarus, amounting to €95 per ton, to reassure farmers and member states. This move will increase prices by at least 50%, potentially destroying demand, and is the first restriction on food since the Ukrainian conflict began.
original:
The EU is preparing to establish duties on grain from Russia and Belarus in the amount of €95 per ton, the Financial Times writes, citing an informed source.

European authorities took these measures in order to reassure farmers and some member states. This will be the first restriction on food since the start of the Ukrainian conflict, the publication indicates.

According to the newspaper's interlocutor, after the introduction of the duty, prices will increase by at least 50%, which will hit demand and practically destroy it. At the same time, duties of 50% will also be introduced on oilseeds and their processed products.

The publication notes that Moscow has already blamed the EU for disruptions in the global food market with its sanctions against Russian banks and energy companies, which has won the sympathy of some developing countries."Cereal prices are at a four-year low, while Russia is very competitive in the grain and exerts significant pressure,” the newspaper summarized. Subscribe to IZ.RU

event: Development of Method for Working with Black Phosphorus
description: Russian scientists from St. Petersburg State Electrotechnical University 'LETI' have developed a method for working with black phosphorus, enabling its use as a semiconductor in compact high-performance electronics. The method allows for accurate testing of semiconductor characteristics and can be applied to other promising substances.
original:
Russian scientists have invented a method for working with promising black phosphorus, which until now has not been used in industry. The new method, developed by specialists from the St. Petersburg State Electrotechnical University "LETI", allows testing the substance as a semiconductor, which opens up the possibility of creating compact high-performance electronics based on it .

To use black phosphorus in industry, it is necessary to apply new approaches to studying its properties and conducting experiments that would make it possible to create a film with the necessary parameters for specific purposes.

The method developed by LETI scientists made it possible to obtain the most accurate parameters of semiconductor characteristics compared to all other existing methods.

It will allow testing not only black phosphorus, but also promising semiconductor crystals of other substances, which can also form the basis for the production of compact electronics on the principles of photonics - an analogue of electronics that uses electromagnetic field quanta - photons - instead of electrons.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

The suspect, a resident of Moldova, was detained at Sochi airport when he tried to leave Russia. Investigators found money and jewelry in a rented apartment in Lyubertsy, near Moscow.

It breaks immediately because.... ALREADY PERFORATED ALONG THE ENTIRE LENGTH...
advertising inscription with the name of the company...

description: A curfew has been established in the Donetsk People's Republic (DPR) from Monday to Friday, from 23:00 to 04:00. Citizens are prohibited from being on the streets and in public places during this time, with exceptions for certain employees and essential services. Violations of the curfew may result in searches, detention, and fines.
original:
The DPR has a curfew from Monday to Friday from 23:00 to 04:00. Decree of the Acting Head of the DPR No. 357 dated September 18, 2023 on the territory of the DPR established a ban on citizens being on the streets and in other public places every week from Monday to Fridays from 23:00 to 04:00 hours. The ban does not apply to employees of government bodies and organizations that: ensure the supply of food and basic necessities; carry out repair and restoration work; work in enterprises with round-the-clock operation; work on special equipment (utility workers , builders, etc.), and also transport goods and people to restore damaged facilities. Such employees must have special passes. During the period of the ban, the following is limited: the movement of public and private transport in the absence of a special pass, as well as taxis; movement of transport without official necessity, with the exception of transport of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Directorate of the FSB (MGB), as well as transport with special passes. Persons violating the curfew, as well as their personal belongings, may be subject to search, and, if there are grounds, detained for the purpose of investigation for a period of no more than 48 hours. Cars may also be detained on which violators travel without a special pass.

       These restrictions are introduced in connection with the introduction of martial law on the territory of the DPR from October 20, 2022. More details in this article 🚷 AND THE MOST IMPORTANT: violation of the martial law regime is punishable by a fine in the amount of 500 rubles to 1 thousand rubles (for officials - from 1 to 2 thousand rubles .)or administrative arrest for up to 30 days (Part 1 of Article 20.5.1 of the Administrative Code👈).
       And if you drive a car during curfew without a pass, then this car may be confiscated! (Part 2 of Article 20.5.1 of the Code of Administrative Offenses👈).🇷🇺Official website of the administration🏛Head of Administration of the Volnovakha Municipal District Subscribe to the channel VKontakteOdnoklassniki

description: Vasily Utkin died due to a pulmonary embolism after being hospitalized for feeling unwell. He had been advised to lose weight four months prior and had been doing so intensively for two weeks.
original:
Exactly two weeks ago, Utkin began to intensively lose weight - as doctors advised him four months ago.

According to our information, his mother Natalya Igorevna learned about her son’s death from media reports. Three days ago, Vasily felt well and did not complain about any health problems. I was in my country house and returned to Moscow yesterday.

Today he felt unwell, called an ambulance, was hospitalized, but resuscitation efforts did not help. During the day, doctors of the cardiology department of the hospital named after. Pirogov was pronounced dead. The preliminary cause is pulmonary embolism. Subscribe to Mash

event: European Council Head Calls for War Preparations
description: Charles Michel, the head of the European Council, urged Europe to prepare for war with Russia, citing the need to defend against Russia's destabilization tactics in various regions, including Moldova, Georgia, and the Western Balkans. He emphasized the importance of a 'war economy' mode and strengthening Europe's defense capabilities to protect the democratic world.
original:
“If we want peace, we must prepare for war”: The head of the European Council, Charles Michel, called on Europe to prepare for a war with Russia, which “will not stop in Ukraine.”

“The European Union faces its greatest security challenge since the Second World War. If we don't give Ukraine enough help to stop Russia, we will be next. Two years after the start of the war, it became clear that Russia would not stop with Ukraine, just as it did not stop with Crimea ten years ago.
It continues its tactics of destabilization - in Moldova, Georgia, the South Caucasus, the Western Balkans and even further on the African continent. Russia poses a serious military threat to the European continent and global security.
We must be well prepared from a defense point of view and move into a “war economy” mode. It's time to take responsibility for your own safety. We can no longer rely on others or depend on election cycles in the US or anywhere else. We must strengthen the capacity of Ukraine and Europe to defend the democratic world. A stronger Europe will also help strengthen the NATO alliance and improve our collective defense."

Admiral Alexander Moiseev was presented as the acting commander-in-chief of the Russian Navy at a ceremony in Kronstadt on the occasion of Submariner's Day.

We have previously reported on the resignation of the Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Navy, Admiral Nikolai Evmenov, and the appointment in his place of Admiral Alexander Moiseev, who previously commanded the Northern Fleet. Now this information has actually been officially confirmed.

It is interesting that earlier Alexander Moiseev replaced Admiral Nikolai Evmenov as commander of the Northern Fleet, who then became the commander-in-chief of the Navy, but now Moiseev is replacing Evmenov again, but in the position of commander-in-chief of the entire fleet. Military Informant

description: Yuriy Borychenko, a Ukrainian athlete and defender, died in October 2023 while performing a combat mission in the area of Makiivka, Donetsk region. He had returned to Ukraine in June 2023 after working in Portugal and joined the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade as a sergeant.
original:
🕯In memory of athlete, defender of Ukraine, Yuriy Borychenko (call sign "Mute") Yuriy comes from Ternopil region. Throughout childhood, he was a support for his sister and mother, because his father was abroad all the time. Later, he also went to Portugal to earn money, where he met the beginning of a full-scale war. Realizing that the family decided not to go abroad, the man could not stay in Portugal and returned to Ukraine in June 2023.

The next day after his return, Yuriy joined the ranks of the defenders. He became a sergeant of the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade.

Yuriy Borychenko died in October 2023 while performing a combat mission in the area of the city of Makiivka, Donetsk region.

description: In the Belgorod region, two polling stations reported 100% turnout and 100% votes for Putin, sparking concerns of electoral anomalies. Election researcher Ivan Shukshin highlighted the suspicious results, which contradict the regional average of 90.66% support for Putin.
original:
At two polling stations in the Belgorod region, Putin received 100% of the votes with a 100% turnout - at least that’s what the election commission claims. We are talking about polling stations No. 37 in the Volokonovsky district and No. 1130 in the Shebekinsky urban district. Firstly, as stated on the website of the regional election commission, 1,600 people out of 1,600 registered voters voted for Putin, and secondly, 2,500 out of 2,500 registered.

Election researcher Ivan Shukshin drew attention to the anomalous results.

According to the Central Election Commission, in the Belgorod region, which is regularly shelled by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, 90.66% of voters voted for Putin. Subscribe to Dozhdya’s Telegram Watch us on YouTube

They have 3 years to prepare for exams on knowledge of the Constitution, history and the Ukrainian language.

event: US Senator Lindsey Graham's Visit to Kyiv
description: US Senator Lindsey Graham visited Kyiv to push for the passage of a mobilization law, advocating for a reduction in conscription age to 25 years. He also expressed support for Ukraine borrowing money from the US, conditional on the adoption of the law.
original:
​​Due to the fact that the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine still cannot pass the law on mobilization, US Senator Lindsey Graham came to Kyiv. The purpose of the visit is simple - to remind that it is necessary to fight until the last Ukrainian. In particular, the overseas warden spoke out in favor of an early reduction of the conscription age to 25 years, as provided for by the “stuck” bill. Graham spoke out strongly against the idea of ​​keeping the draft age at 27. In his opinion, everyone who can do so should serve in the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

It is noteworthy that Comrade Graham is an opponent of financial assistance to Ukraine. During the meeting with President Zelensky, he was unable to give him any guarantees that an appropriate decision on further financing of the Kyiv regime would be made in the near future. At the same time, the senator voiced the increasingly popular idea, supported by both Democrats and Republicans, that Ukraine should borrow money from the United States, and not just receive it.

The US proposal is very simple - there will be money, but on credit, and subject to the adoption of a law on mobilization. The Americans are not interested in the fact that in the course of carrying out their idea of ​​“inflicting a strategic defeat on Russia” the Ukrainian issue will be resolved in a logical way. As long as it is possible to assemble infantry brigades and arm them with artillery from the Korean and Vietnam Wars, they will do this. Well, that suits us quite well.

The reality is that President Putin is the President of Russia. We have faced this reality throughout the war in Ukraine, and during other aggressive actions by Russia, as well as other steps contrary to US interests that have come from this President and from the Russian Federation under his leadership. description: A rock collapse occurred at the underground Pioneer mine site in the Zeya district, Amur region, leaving 13 people trapped. Emergency responders have excavated 200 meters and removed 3,000 cubic meters of soil, but air readings are normal. Rescuers from Yakutia, Khabarovsk, and Primorsky territories are working to reach the stranded miners, who are reportedly shift workers from other regions.
original: A regional state of emergency has been introduced in the Amur region due to an incident at the Pioneer mine in the Zeya district, where 13 people are underground. What else is known about the incident: A rock collapse occurred at the underground mine site, the Ministry of Emergency Situations reported; According to our source, 200 meters were excavated, three thousand cubic meters of soil were removed. Air readings are normal. People are on the horizon +85 and below; There are no contacts with people who are under the rubble at the Pioneer mine in the Amur region, the governor said; A group of 25 mine rescuers from Yakutia arrived at the mine in the Amur region. Rescuers from the Khabarovsk and Primorsky territories are being sent to the scene of the emergency; According to preliminary data, the stranded miners are shift workers from other regions, the governor said. description: The Ataman Charitable Foundation collected 2,349,893 rubles in February 2024, with 652,470 rubles from external donors and 1,697,423 rubles from the founder and partners. The funds were used to purchase medical supplies, equipment, and pay instructors teaching tactical medicine and weapon handling to Volunteer Assault Corps recruits.
original:
Results of the activities of the Ataman Charitable Foundation for February 2024.

In the current month, the Fund's total collections amounted to 2,349,893 rubles. 652,470 rubles were received from external donors. Contributions from the founder of the Fund and his partners amounted to 1,697,423 rubles.

The funds collected were used to purchase first aid kits, medicines and equipment. A separate expense column is payment for the work of instructors of the Ataman Charitable Foundation, who teach recruits of the Volunteer Assault Corps, free of charge, tactical medicine and the basics of safe weapon handling. After a long break, we finally brought the guys a loaf!!!! Thanks to everyone involved!!!

The first caravan with humanitarian aid was sent by the Foundation on November 7, 2022. As of March 1, 2024, we were able to send our guys inventory worth more than 34 million rubles. Be with us - First Cossack

description: A joint meeting of CIS member states and the Economic Council's commission on economic issues is taking place in Minsk. The meeting aims to strengthen economic cooperation and integration within the CIS, which is currently lower than that of the European Union. First Deputy Secretary General of the CIS Leonid Anfimov emphasized the need to revive or create new economic ties, citing the high level of integration during the Soviet Union era.
original:
A joint meeting of the permanent representatives of the CIS member states and the commission on economic issues under the Economic Council of the organization is taking place in Minsk. “We talk a lot about the need to strengthen or deepen integration of economic cooperation within the CIS. You know, the level of integration in the CIS countries is much lower than the level of integration that has developed in the countries of the European Union, including in the economic sphere.

When we lived in a single country - the Soviet Union - our level of integration and cooperation in the economy was so high that many were envious. When we fled to our national homes, our biggest mistake was that we broke cooperation and integration ties in the economy. All this must either be revived or something new be created,” said First Deputy Secretary General of the CIS Leonid Anfimov. @radiomirby

A personal reception of citizens was held by the Deputy Head of the Administration of the Gorlovka Urban District of the Donetsk People's Republic Alexey Ivakhnenko

Today, March 19, a personal reception of citizens was held by the deputy head of the administration of the Gorlovka urban district of the Donetsk People's Republic, Alexey Ivakhnenko.

During the reception, Gorlovka residents approached the deputy head of the administration, in charge of the social sphere, regarding the provision of premises for holding a meeting of the deaf society.

The Deputy Head of the Administration of the Gorlovka Urban District provided the applicants with competent explanations on the issues raised within the framework of the current legislation.

original:
🇷🇺🤝The path of the residents of Novorossiya was tragic, but they returned to their family! Russian President Vladimir Putin performed at a concert in honor of the tenth anniversary of the reunification of Crimea with the Russian Federation.

He congratulated the Russians on this event and also addressed the residents of Novorossiya.

The Russian leader recalled that the people who live there wanted to become part of Russia and did. Hand in hand, Russia and new regions will continue to move forward. This makes the country stronger.

“Their path to their homeland turned out to be more difficult and tragic, but still, we did it and this is also a great event in the history of our state. Now we are developing and moving together, feeling each other’s elbow,” Vladimir Putin. Vladimir Rogov|Rogov. Voice of the People

event: State Tests of Self-Propelled Artillery Control Kits
description: The Belarusian company NIIEVM successfully completed state tests of self-propelled artillery control kits, which were subsequently adopted into service with the republic's army. The kits feature a counting and solving system, communications and data transmission, navigation, and technical support.
original:
🇧🇾The Belarusian company “NIIEVM” has successfully completed state tests of self-propelled artillery control kits.

Based on the test results, the products were adopted into service with the republic’s army.

The kit includes the following main systems: a counting and solving system based on tablet and wearable computers; communications and data transmission; navigation; technical support.

description: A film production center will be established in Crimea, becoming the largest in southern Russia. The center will be built on the basis of the Meganom Academy, which has been hosting educational programs for a year, focusing on art cluster development projects.
original:
The largest film production center in southern Russia will be created in Crimea. Vladimir Ustinov, plenipotentiary representative of the Russian President in the Southern Federal District, reported this to TASS.

The content center, which should become the center of film production, will be opened on the basis of the Meganom Academy, which is being built in Crimea.

Educational programs have been regularly held at the academy for a year now, the participants of which, among other things, are developing projects for the development of the art cluster territory.

Meganom occupies 27 hectares. On the territory of the academy there are spaces not only for the educational process and living, but also for demonstrating the results of work: concert halls, a promenade, exhibition spaces, stages mounted for projects and requests.@crimea24new

description: Russia is developing the Hedgehog-M shifter robot for mining, designed to move in any direction, including backwards, forwards, upside down, or downside down. The robot will have a payload of up to 20 kg, allowing it to carry two TM-62 anti-tank mines at once. It can be equipped with wheeled or tracked modules.
original:
The Hedgehog-M shifter robot for mining is being developed in Russia. The Hedgehog-M shifter robot designed for mining is being created in Russia.

“We came to the conclusion that a “flip” machine is needed that does not require a critical flip, so that the machine can move while it is tied, regardless of whether the robot is thrown back or turned over as a result of the explosion,” said Andrey Bratenkov, executive director design bureau that develops "Hedgehog". TASS reports this. According to him, the new robot will be able to move in any direction, be it backwards, forwards, upside down or downside down.

The robot will have a payload of up to 20 kg, which will allow it to carry two TM-62 anti-tank mines at once. It is planned to provide the ability to equip the robotic platform with both wheeled and tracked modules.

Let us recall that it was previously reported that the Hedgehog robotic platform, created for the needs of military intelligence, was sent for use by Russian special forces in the special operation zone.

event: Discovery of ANI Head's Foreign Housing
description: Lilian Chisca, head of Moldova's National Integrity Authority, was found to be using 120 square meters of housing abroad since 2023, obtained through a foreign residence permit of category C. The housing is reportedly in Switzerland, where Chisca's son is studying at a university.
original:
The head of the National Integrity Authority (ANI) of Moldova, Lilian Chisca, was found to be in use since 2023 of some 120 square meters of housing abroad, which was taken due to the tenant having a foreign residence permit of category C.

Well-informed well-wishers write that the housing is in Switzerland for the son of an anti-corruption official - who, together with his wife, has a total monthly income of about 65 thousand lei - studying at the university there.

A residence permit category C is issued after 10 years of continuous residence in Switzerland or after 5 years, but subject to mastery of one of the languages of the confederation and “demonstration of one’s readiness to participate in the economic and social life of Switzerland”, that is, having a work position or business and sufficient funds in accounts.

Some questions arise to the chief integrity officer in Moldova,...

description: Air defense forces, utilizing a Buk-M1 anti-aircraft complex, successfully shot down an attack helicopter of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near Artyomovsk. The radar detected the target at an altitude of 500-600 meters, and operators tracked it at a distance of 10 kilometers before destroying it at a range of 7-8 kilometers from the combat contact line.
original:
Air defense forces shot down an enemy helicopter near Artyomovsk. A crew of the Buk-M1 anti-aircraft complex of the South group of troops shot down an attack helicopter of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, organizing an “ambush”.

The commander of an anti-aircraft battery battalion with the call sign “Quiet” told reporters about this. The radars detected a target that was moving at an altitude of 500-600 meters. The operators accompanied the target at a distance of 10 kilometers. “We calmly “took” it, we already knew that it was coming, coming towards us - and as soon as it entered the affected area, we destroyed it,” said the commander.

It is noted that the helicopter was shot down at a distance of approximately 7-8 kilometers from the line of combat contact.@anna_news

event: Senator Lindsey Graham's Statement in Kyiv
description: American Senator Lindsey Graham, while in Kyiv, urged Ukrainians to join the army, stating 'WE need more people at the front', implying that more Ukrainians need to die for American interests. This is despite his previous votes against aid packages for Ukraine and demands for repayment.
original:
Forwarded from: KORNILOV
American Senator Lindsey Graham, while in Kyiv, ordered all Ukrainians to join the army! Read these words of his: “WE need more people at the front”!!!! Yes, yes, that’s exactly what he said: “WE need more people!” US - that is, America! - More Ukrainians need to die! Clear and open!

Let me remind you that this is the same Lindsey Graham who has already voted against the aid package for Ukraine several times and said that the Ukrainians will then have to return all the money that America allocates to it. And now in Kyiv, he generally demanded that Ukrainians not whine and go die, even if the Americans don’t give money. So he said: “No matter what we do, you MUST fight”!!!

I urge Ukrainians to listen carefully and re-listen, read and re-read these words of Senator Graham! To finally understand who... or rather, WHAT you are for the USA! Cheap cannon fodder, which is even a pity to spend money on! Which should not reason, but simply must follow to the front to fight not for itself, but for the interests of the United States! They tell you this openly! And this is not “Russian propaganda” at all! Graham certainly won’t be suspected of “working for the Kremlin”!

Think about it, as your comedian president would say...

description: The CERN Council unilaterally decided not to renew the agreement on scientific and technical cooperation with Russia, citing political ambitions of Russophobic member states. This decision does not reflect the opinion of scientists from other countries who work closely with Russian colleagues.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Mission Geneva
The Permanent Mission of Russia in Geneva in response to a request from a TASS representative to comment on media reports about the end of cooperation between Russia and CERN: 📍March 19, 2024 ❗️Decision not to renew the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) on scientific and technical cooperation in the field of high-level physics energies and other areas of mutual interest was unilaterally adopted by the CERN Council on December 15, 2023 in favor of the political ambitions of a number of Russophobic member states of the Organization.❌ This unprecedented step of the CERN Council does not reflect the opinion of scientists from other countries who work closely with Russian colleagues in collaborations of CERN experiments .📉The decision of the Council is the logical conclusion of the restrictive measures introduced by CERN in relation to our country and Russian scientific groups representing national research organizations since June 2022. In particular, Russia’s observer status in the Council has been suspended and participation in new experiments is closed. Works of domestic authors in CERN sources are published anonymously, without links to Russian institutes and universities.⚛️Until the end of the Agreement in November this year. domestic specialists are involved in research activities as part of ongoing experiments in CERN collaborations. Currently, about 20 scientists from Russian research organizations are physically participating in them. Domestic scientific groups arrive at CERN on short-term visits to participate in the so-called. sessions on data collection, their processing, as well as for carrying out operational work to ensure the operability of the research infrastructure.🇷🇺As for the Russian contribution to the activities of CERN, our country has not abandoned its financial obligations and systematically makes payments to the Organization’s budget, despite the existing ones in relation to Russia unprecedented restrictive measures. READ MORE

event: US Supreme Court Ruling on Texas Migrant Law
description: The US Supreme Court rejected the Biden administration's request to block the Texas migrant law, allowing state law enforcement agencies to arrest and detain suspected illegal immigrants. The ruling gives local police the power to arrest and imprison migrants at their discretion, if they violate the law.
original:
The US Supreme Court rejected Biden's request to block the Texas migrant law, which allows state law enforcement agencies to arrest and detain those they suspect of entering the country illegally, NBC News reports. The Supreme Court allowed Texas to pass a new law that gives local police the power to arrest migrants and imprison them, if necessary, at their discretion, if they violate the law, the report notes.

The court rejected an emergency request from the Biden administration that said states do not have the authority to make immigration laws. That is, according to the Biden administration, only the federal government has sole authority in this matter.

Texas Republican Gov. Greg Abbott welcomed the court's ruling, calling it "a clearly positive development." In turn, White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said that the law “will not only make communities in Texas less safe, but will also burden law enforcement and sow chaos and confusion on the southern border.”📮Subscribe to BREAKING

description: Russia celebrates Submariner Day on March 19, marking the official date of birth of the submarine forces of the Russian fleet. The holiday was established in 1996 by the Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Navy.
original:
Forwarded from: PisAnina
On March 19, Russia celebrates Submariner Day, established by the order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Navy dated July 15, 1996 “On the introduction of annual holidays and professional days in the specialty.” The date for the professional holiday was not chosen by chance. On March 19 (March 6, old style), 1906, submarines in the Russian fleet were designated as an independent class of warships. This is evidenced by the order of the Naval Department No. 52 dated March 24 (March 11, old style) 1906, signed by the Minister of the Navy, which states: “The Sovereign Emperor [Nicholas II], on the sixth day of March of this year, deigned to give the highest command... to include in the classification of naval vessels, the category of submarines." This day is considered the official date of birth of the submarine forces of the Russian fleet. Happy holiday to all involved!

description: Vasily Utkin, a renowned sports commentator and journalist, has passed away at the age of 52. Utkin also created his own YouTube channel and hosted the 'Panopticon' program on Dozhd TV.
original:
Sports commentator and journalist Vasily Utkin has died. Sports journalist Ivan Karpov reports this.

Vasily Utkin was 52 years old. Information about his death was confirmed by journalist Andrei Pankov, writes Sports. “It is very painful for us to write this post. But it's true. Vasily is no longer with us,” writes the telegram channel of the Egrisi football club, which was owned by Utkin. Utkin worked as a football commentator on the NTV, NTV-Plus, Match TV and Eurosport channels.

From 2010 to 2015, he served as editor-in-chief of NTV-Plus. In 2004 and 2005, Utkin won the TEFI Award as the best sports commentator. In recent years, the journalist has created his own YouTube channel.

In 2019-2020, on the Dozhd TV channel, Utkin was the host of the “Panopticon” program together with Alexander Nevzorov and Anna Nemzer. Subscribe to Dozhd’s Telegram Watch us on YouTube

description: The American Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) published a report on Mongolia, suggesting that the US should invest more in the country to counterbalance Russian and Chinese influence. The report highlights Mongolia's valuable resources, including fluorspar, and proposes a more flexible approach to investment.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
🇺🇸🇲🇳The American Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), in the context of its Asian program, published an interesting note about Mongolia.

We have already repeatedly told how Western countries actively seized influence in the republic, which is why there is a strong impression that the Mongols are destined for the “Ukrainian scenario.”

The CSIS article explicitly notes that the United States should invest more in Mongolia for at least several reasons: To “overwhelm” the authority of Russia and China: experts suggest that investing in the republic would be a “pleasant opportunity for America’s financial agencies.” We all know very well how these opportunities usually end for statehood, sovereignty and, in general, the fate of the nation.🔻To take possession of valuable resources. Analysts directly emphasize that Mongolia ranks third in the world in the production of fluorspar (10% of the world's volume, excluding the States), which is included in the list of essential minerals by the US Department of Energy.

There’s just one problem: Mongolia’s legislation, its ties with the Russian Federation and the People’s Republic of China make the country quite “risky for investment.” But if we could influence the authorities a little so that they would adopt the necessary strategy and laws, then investors would immediately run to invest money. It is quite obvious that in Washington they directly tell the Mongolian authorities what and how to do in order to get the opportunity to become a “favorite Asian wife” . However, history has repeatedly proven that such a role is reserved only for those countries that are willing to sacrifice not only state sovereignty, but also national identity. Economic EngagementCSIS expert Erin Murphy proposes that U.S. financing agencies should pursue a more flexible approach to investment in strategic middle powers such as Mongolia.

event: CERN Cuts Ties with Russian Scientists
description: CERN has decided to sever ties with Russian scientists, citing European political pressure. This move will result in the loss of unique specialists and equipment suppliers. Russia, on the other hand, is expected to benefit from the return of brilliant scientists who have gained valuable experience.
original:
CERN will only lose from breaking relations with Russian scientists, because they will lose unique specialists.

In addition, Russia regularly supplied its equipment and financed projects, so CERN simply obeys the opinion of European politicians, said Vice-President of the Russian Academy of Sciences Vladislav Panchenko.

In a conversation with Zvezda, he noted that CERN’s refusal to work with our scientists was not a surprise, since 5-year contracts with Russian and Belarusian specialists were just ending. It’s very convenient to just not renew them.

Meanwhile, Panchenko is confident that Russia will only benefit from this decision by CERN. Now brilliant people who have gained unique work experience will return to the country. More than 50 such specialists will come to the Institute of High Energy Physics in Serpukhov alone, noted the Vice-President of the Russian Academy of Sciences.

Let us recall that earlier CERN official representative Arnaud Marsollier said that from November 30, CERN will no longer cooperate with approximately 500 specialists who have connections with Russian organizations. And in the future, other groups will take over the work at the Large Hadron Collider. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

description: Rescuers from the Ministry of Emergency Situations raised the flags of Crimea and Russia in 10 iconic locations across the republic to commemorate the Day of Reunification. 👨‍🚒Rescuers raised the flags of Crimea and Russia in 10 iconic places of the republic. Employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations timed this action to coincide with the Day of the reunification of the peninsula with Russia. Rescuers from the Bakhchisarai detachment went to the top of Mount Syuyuru-Kaya, and from Simferopol - to Pakhkal-Kaya. The Yevpatoria detachment held an action near the monument to paratroopers, and the Dzhankoy detachment held an action on Russky Island.

Alushta employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations took one of the most difficult routes - for about 2.5 hours they climbed a steep slope to the highest point of Chatyr-Dag - Eklizi-Burun. description: A confrontation between an anticyclone and a cyclone is expected in the Moscow region from Wednesday, leading to unusual temperature patterns. The weather will be cloudy with clearings and no precipitation on Wednesday, partly cloudy with lots of sun on Thursday and Friday, and cloudy with clearing and light precipitation on Saturday.
original:
Steady spring weather will come to Moscow on Saturday, said Roman Vilfand, scientific director of the Russian Hydrometeorological Center.

A confrontation between an anticyclone and a cyclone is expected in the capital region from Wednesday. In particular, as Vilfand clarified, this will lead to the fact that “night and day temperatures will collide with each other - night temperatures will be the same as day temperatures, but with a minus sign.” On Wednesday in Moscow there will be cloudy weather with clearings and no precipitation, temperature at night from -7 to -2, during the day - from +2 to +7. On Thursday and Friday the influence of the anticyclone will be greater, so partly cloudy weather and “lots of sun” are forecast. Night temperatures will be -8...-3 degrees, and during the day - +3...+8 degrees.

On Saturday in Moscow and the Moscow region there will be cloudy weather with clearing, light precipitation in places, light sleet at night, light rain during the day. The temperature at night will be around zero, and during the day - +5...+9 degrees. Photo: Moscow Agency@interfaxonline

description: A 31-year-old man was found guilty of occupying a plot of land in the water protection zone and coastal protective strip of the Uda River, building gazebos, and renting them out. The court verdict, which has entered into force, orders the man to release the illegally seized land, depriving the Kharkiv City Council of its intended use and individuals of free access to the reservoir.
original:
🔷Thanks to the intervention of the prosecutor's office, the man will release the illegally seized plot of land near the Uda River, on which he built a "business" 🖌️The court satisfied the claim filed by the head of the Novobavarian District Prosecutor's Office in Kharkiv in the interests of the state, represented by the Kharkiv City Council, against the 31-year-old man regarding his voluntary release occupied land plot.

Prosecutors established that the man arbitrarily occupied a plot of land in the water protection zone and coastal protective strip of the Uda River, which is located within the boundaries of the October Hydropark on the territory of the rescue station "October Hydropark". Later, the man built gazebos there, which he rented out and received money for.

By the verdict of the Zhovtnevy District Court of Kharkiv, which has entered into force, the dealer was found guilty of committing a criminal offense provided for in Part 4 of Art. 197-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

According to the requirements of Part 6 of Art. 82 of the Civil Code of Ukraine, a court verdict in a criminal proceeding that has entered into legal force is binding for a court considering the legal consequences of the actions or inactions of the person in respect of whom the verdict was passed, only in the question of whether these actions (inactions) took place and whether they were committed by this person.

Arbitrary occupation of the land plot by the defendant deprives the Kharkiv City Council of the right to use it for its intended purpose, and also deprives individuals of the right to visit the territory of the reservoir free of charge and without hindrance.

These violations became the basis for the prosecutor to file a lawsuit with the court, which has now been fully satisfied.

The decision was made by the October District Court of Kharkiv. The term for an appeal continues. ⚔ Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office

description: Latvian authorities announced the deportation of four Russians who participated in the presidential elections in the Russian Federation. The individuals were detained during an immigration control operation at the Russian Embassy polling station, where 29 people with expired residence permits were identified.
original:
Forwarded from: Compromising evidence CIS
In Latvia, they announced the deportation of four Russians who participated in the elections. Latvian authorities announced their intentions to deport four Russians who participated in the presidential elections in the Russian Federation last weekend. This was reported by the Office of Citizenship and Migration Affairs, media reports.

The department spoke about the “immigration control” that was carried out on March 17. Law enforcement officers checked the documents of Russians in line at the polling station at the Russian Embassy and detained 29 people whose residence permits had expired. “After completion of the procedures initiated by the State Border Service, in the coming days the Office of Citizenship and Migration Affairs will issue orders for voluntary departure to four persons, which provide for departure from the territory of the Republic of Latvia within 30 days,” the OCMA of Latvia clarified. In addition, one Russian citizen’s residence permit was canceled in January, and therefore he is obliged to leave the country by April 1. Another 7 citizens have permission to stay in the EU, and 17 are waiting to receive a residence permit.

description: A gold mine in the Zeya district of the Amur region experienced two collapses, trapping miners under the rubble. Rescuers have been working for over 15 hours to reach the miners, using over 100 people and various equipment to remove the rubble. The rescue efforts are ongoing, with no contact yet established with the miners, who have air but an uncertain amount of time left.
original:
❗️❗️❗️In the Amur region, rescuers have been trying for more than 15 hours to reach the miners trapped under the rubble at the mine.

According to Baza, the first collapse on the territory of a gold mine in the Zeya district occurred on March 18 at 20:40 on the northeastern exploration slope of the Bakhmut mine. 10 hours later, the mine collapsed again.

According to sources, boulders are now being brought into the mine to block the collapse. More than 100 people, as well as various equipment, are involved in the work.

Sources said the “blockage” occurred at the 70 mark. Presumably, in order to get to the miners, it is necessary to remove 15-20 square meters of rubble vertically, and 50-60 meters along the length.

At the moment, rescuers are just starting the main phase of removing rocks: up to this point, they were calculating what to do to safely remove the collapse and not harm people.

At the moment there is no contact with the miners. There is still a chance that they are alive: they have air, but how long it will last is unclear. https://t.me/bazabazon/25998?singleTelegramBaza0:12VIEW MESSAGE

event: Evacuation of Children from Belgorod Region
description: Due to shelling by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, approximately 9,000 children will be relocated from the Belgorod region to other regions. The decision comes after a week of shelling resulted in 16 fatalities and 98 injuries, including a 14-year-old teenager who lost their hand.
original:
Forwarded from: Yana Poplavskaya
❗️A decision was made to remove about 9 thousand children from the Belgorod region to other regions due to shelling by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Governor Gladkov said.

During the week of shelling in the Belgorod region, 16 people were killed and 98 injured.

During the last shelling of the village of Razumny, Belgorod Region, a 14-year-old teenager’s hand was torn off. Many months ago, I called for the evacuation of children, women and the elderly from Belgorod and border areas. Even then it was clear that the enemy would strike at the most vulnerable points. Now will Belgorod have its own Alley of Angels, and then all other cities? This is a very misleading impression that Belgorod is far away. It’s just a stone’s throw from Moscow, only 6-7 hours by car. Less than an hour flight.
Yes, even if it’s five thousand kilometers. This is Russia, this is our country. It's not somewhere out there, it's here, with us!
Realize already! The most dangerous thing in war is to underestimate the enemy and rest in the fact that we are stronger—Vladimir Ilyich Lenin.

description: Russian authorities may open a criminal case against Spartak Moscow forward Quincy Promes for systematic tax evasion, potentially allowing him to avoid a six-year sentence in the Netherlands for cocaine smuggling. Spartak Moscow forward Quincy Promes can avoid a six-year sentence in the Netherlands for smuggling almost one and a half tons of cocaine thanks to a possible criminal case in Russia for systematic tax evasion.

According to Mash, he owed the Federal Tax Service 397 thousand rubles even before he flew to training camp in the UAE. All this time, the department notified him that he needed to throw money into the treasury, but Antokha safely ignored push notifications. Because of this, tax authorities can now go to court to recover the required amount. But!

Since Promes is now in custody in Dubai, he cannot answer according to the law and return almost 400k. Therefore, taking into account all the nuances in the football player’s case, the scenario could be as follows: first, law enforcement officers will open a criminal case against Quincy, put him on the wanted list, and then ask the Emirates for extradition. In this way, the footballer will be able to avoid a prison sentence in his homeland, and then - to pay off his debt in Moscow and, if he’s lucky, continue to play for the red and whites, as well as do business. event: Transfer of Danish Anti-Tank Mine to Ukraine
description: A photo has been released of the Danish anti-tank mine PM M/47-I, which has been transferred to Ukraine. The mine features a metal body and uses M47-I or M47-II detonators. The M47-I detonator is triggered by a pressure of 250 kg on the plate, releasing the spring-loaded striker and initiating the fuse. The M47-II detonator is cocked during mine setup and is triggered during removal.
original:
Photo of the Danish anti-tank mine PM M/47-I (Pansermine M/47) transferred to Ukraine.
It has a metal body, M47-I or M47-II detonators are used.
When using the M47-I blaster, pressure on the plate with a force of 250 kg causes the shear pin to fail, releasing the spring-loaded striker. The striker initiates the fuse and the chain of fire.
The second M47-II detonator is cocked when setting a mine and is triggered to remove it. Source

event: Detection and Destruction of Ukrainian MLRS
description: A SKAT 350M drone, produced by the Izhevsk Aviation Plant, detected a Ukrainian RM-70 Vampire multiple launch rocket system near the Belgorod region. The drone provided coordinates to the Russian Ministry of Defense, leading to a precise missile strike that critically damaged the MLRS and resulted in casualties among its crew.
original:
The SKAT 350M drone aimed missiles at the Vampire MLRS of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near the Belgorod region. The SKAT 350M drone produced by the Izhevsk Aviation Plant detected the RM-70 Vampire multiple launch rocket system of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which was preparing to shell Belgorod from the territory of the Kharkov region, and aimed a missile strike at it from the Russian Armed Forces, the corresponding video was published by the Kalashnikov concern. “The coordinates of the enemy installation, obtained thanks to the UAV, were promptly transferred to the Russian Ministry of Defense. As a result of a precise missile strike, the RM-70 was critically damaged and failed, among its crew there were “two hundred” and “three hundred,” the concern reported.

The SKAT 350 drone is equipped with daytime and thermal imaging cameras and is designed for aerial surveillance, searching for objects in the optical and infrared ranges. The drone is also distinguished by improved aerodynamics, it has increased mechanical strength of the wing structure and control elements." This is also confirmed by the episode with the detection of the Ukrainian Armed Forces MLRS: SKAT 350M detected it while being at the limit of the permissible flight time. But this did not prevent the drone from safely returning to the launch point and make a normal landing without damage,” added Kalashnikov.@wingsofwar

event: Renovation of Mariupol College of Transport and Industrial Technologies
description: The Mariupol College of Transport and Industrial Technologies is undergoing renovation to provide comfortable conditions for 640 students. The institution will train specialists in construction, land transport, heat and power, metallurgy, mechanical engineering, industry, service, and tourism. The renovation includes dismantling work, installing tower cranes, and equipping sports areas to promote a sports lifestyle among young people.
original:
Forwarded from: Marat Khusnullin
I have repeatedly talked about the restoration of educational infrastructure in new regions. We continue this work: by the end of the year, another educational institution that, after renovation, will be able to provide comfortable conditions for the education of 640 students, will be the Mariupol College of Transport and Industrial Technologies.

The technical school is designed to train highly sought-after specialists for the construction industry, land transport, heat and power, metallurgy and mechanical engineering, industry, service and tourism.

And if in general the educational process is structured well, then the infrastructure of the institution on an area of more than three hectares is yet to be put in order by the specialists of the training and production complex “Single Customer in the Construction Industry”. They are now carrying out dismantling work at the site and installing tower cranes.

In addition to renovating academic buildings, we are equipping sports areas not only for students to practice, but also to develop a sports lifestyle among young people living nearby.

description: Vasily Utkin, a renowned Russian football commentator and actor, passed away at the age of 53. The cause of death remains unknown. original:
Vasily Utkin died on Tuesday at the age of 53. The causes of death have not been specified.

He has worked on television since 1994, hosted a number of football programs and commentated on matches on NTV and NTV-Plus. He announced his retirement from commentating in 2017.

However, the bill was categorically opposed by the Biden administration, which even appealed to the Supreme Court to prohibit Texas security forces from screwing up illegal immigrants. However, the Supreme Court, having considered Biden’s claim, rejected it. State authorities were allowed to arrest illegal immigrants and deport them from the United States by court order. The White House is already outraged by the court's refusal to protect migrants, but is powerless to do anything. “We fundamentally disagree with the Supreme Court's order allowing the unconstitutional and harmful Texas law to take effect. event: Discovery of Enemy Drone Radio Beacon
description: Comrades from the field reported discovering a radio beacon on an enemy drone, designed to locate fallen drones. The autonomous device has a separate battery, GPS module, Lora Wan transmission module, BEC power supply, and power button. It can transmit powerful packages via LoraWan, potentially revealing troop locations. The device has a power off button, but it may not actually turn off, making it a potential threat.
original:
Forwarded from: Rosich | Rosich
Our comrades from the field report:

On the way out they dragged the enemy's Mavik, it had a box on it, it's good that he immediately cut off the Akum and took it for study, and the other guys picked up exactly the same one and brought it to their disposal and what do you think came to them, so warn the guys.

This is important information that can and should be shared. These or similar boxes are installed on enemy drones. They are distinguished by the presence of a Lora antenna and that’s it, they are not connected to anything. At the same time, they are tightly attached to the drone. Just a box with an antenna

Inside she has:
1. Separate own battery
2. Advanced GPS receiving module
3. Lora Wan transmission module
4. BEC power supply
5. Power button and buzzer

We at the Central Clinical Biological Bureau figured out what it was for, but quickly realized that it was a radio beacon for searching for fallen drones. Autonomous. Receives the jeep and sends rare but powerful packages via LoraWan. The protocol is energy-saving, can lie and transmit for a long time and far.

It would seem, well, a radio beacon, what could go wrong with it. Anything can go wrong with it: they captured the drone, turned it off, brought it to the support center. In a couple of hours it will fly at you in such a way that it won’t seem like much. Because with the help of this simple device you yourself will tell the Ukrainian where you sleep, eat and listen to lectures from your commanders.
 
There is a power off button on the box. So, I wouldn't trust her. I would also put a button on this device, and even solder everything correctly, but it would only turn off the buzzer. And no one would have guessed that nothing ever actually turns off.

Therefore, if you see an autonomous box with a Lora antenna, it is better to condemn it on the spot. Better yet, leave it in place and mine it. The crest will return for his habr, and there will be a gift. @rosich_ru

description: Russian forces attempted to retrieve a damaged Ukrainian Leopard-2 tank of the Swedish modification Strv-122 near Kremennaya. They managed to hook the tank with two of their own tanks, but Ukrainian drones intervened, destroying both Russian tanks. This highlights the importance of destroying damaged equipment to prevent enemy recovery and propaganda.
original: The Russians tried to take away the damaged Ukrainian Leopard-2 of the Swedish modification Strv-122 from the battlefield near Kremennaya. The enemy managed to hook the Leopard with two tanks and drag it towards their positions. However, the Ukrainian drones arrived on time and both Russian tanks were destroyed. A clear example that damaged equipment must be destroyed, otherwise the enemy will do everything to evacuate and restore it for propaganda purposes.

description: Vice-mayor of Tulun, Elena Abramova, was detained in the Irkutsk region on charges of abuse of power and fraud. The arrest was allegedly due to excessive monetary incentives, with Abramova writing out money to subordinates, which then ended up as kickbacks in her pockets.
original:
Forwarded from: 112
Vice-mayor of Tulun Elena Abramova was detained in the Irkutsk region.

Another official from the administration was taken in the morning. She was charged with abuse of power and fraud. According to our source, the reason for the arrest was excessive monetary incentives. The mayor, who ruled Tulun after the arrest of the previous mayor, wrote out money to her subordinates, and then they ended up as kickbacks in her pockets.

In addition, the security forces are interested in Abramova’s activities during the period of the work of the ex-mayor of Tulun, Yuri Karikh, who is now in a pre-trial detention center. He is accused of fraudulent schemes with real estate - after the flood of 2019, officials registered leftist people in emergency houses, and then heroically resettled them, receiving real estate purchased with federal money.

Now Elena Abramova is under interrogation. The issue of choosing a preventive measure for her will be decided in the near future.

Tulun sign: sat in the mayor's chair - sushi crackers.

event: Polish President Warns of Russian Attack
description: Polish President Andrzej Duda warned that Russia may have the military potential to attack NATO as early as 2026-2027, citing a report by German experts. He emphasized the need for NATO countries to increase their defense spending, suggesting a threshold of 3 percent of GDP.
original:
🇵🇱“Russia may be able to attack NATO as early as 2026” - Polish President Duda “Russia may soon have such a military potential that it will be able to attack NATO as early as 2026-2027,” President Andrzej Duda said in an interview with CNBC , citing a report by German experts.

Thus, the president argued the need to increase defense spending of the Alliance countries.

The President of Poland believes that it is the threat of an attack by the Russian Federation that should influence NATO to increase the required threshold for countries' defense spending from 2 to 3 percent of GDP. By the way, the same technique is used in the UK.

event: 40th Anniversary of Service of Dmitry Donskoy
description: The heavy nuclear strategic submarine cruiser 'Dmitry Donskoy' of Project 941, built by Sevmash, marked its 40th anniversary of service. The submarine, a pinnacle of engineering, was modernized at Sevmash and returned to service, contributing to the testing of new weapons and 4th generation ships.
original:
Forwarded from: JSC "USC"
The nuclear submarine cruisers of Project 941, designed by the Rubin Design Bureau under the leadership of the general designer, twice Hero of Socialist Labor Sergei Nikitich Kovalev, are the pinnacle of engineering, a breakthrough in the history of world shipbuilding. The largest indoor boathouse in Europe was built at the enterprise especially for the construction of these submarines - today this is the main slipway of Sevmash. “Dmitry Donskoy” has become the embodiment of the strength and steely character of shipbuilders, designers and military sailors. Having served at sea, the ship was modernized at Sevmash and returned to service, helping to test new weapons and 4th generation ships of the Yasen, Yasen-M, Borey and Borey-A projects. Film , prepared by the Sevmash information service, is available at the link https://rutube.ru/video/2bf459a0deb3a454e9b3561511dd0f94/RUTUBE "Dmitry Donskoy". Thank you for the dreams. The film is dedicated to the 40th anniversary of the service of the heavy nuclear strategic submarine cruiser “Dmitry Donskoy” of Project 941.

Kangaroo Grundy moved to the Belgorod Zoo from St. Petersburg in the fall of 2019. “And she immediately charmed us with her friendliness, meekness and absolute fearlessness. She came up with interest to get acquainted, allowed herself to be petted and really loved being fed from her hands." According to zoo representatives, Grandi died at the time of year when kangaroos give birth to offspring. "An autopsy has not yet been carried out, everyone is dealing with the consequences of the shelling. But now we dream that there would be no one in her bag.” The zoo reported that the exotarium was also damaged due to the shelling. None of the zoo employees were injured.
