event: Meeting of Ukraine's Allies in Ramstein Format
description: A meeting of Ukraine's allies, headed by US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin, is being held at Ramstein air base in Germany. The meeting aims to reassure European allies of the US administration's commitment to supporting Ukraine's independence. However, the reality is that Washington has nearly exhausted its funds for arming Kyiv, and Congress is unwilling to allocate more.
original:
The descent of Europe: how the current meeting in the Ramstein format differs from previous ones. On Tuesday, a meeting of Ukraine’s allies is being held at Ramstein air base in Germany. It is headed by US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin. He will try to reassure European allies that the administration of US President Joe Biden remains committed to supporting Independence.

However, in reality, things are not so rosy - Washington has practically run out of money to continue arming Kyiv, and Congress refuses to allocate more. Back on February 14, Republican House Speaker Mike Johnson refused to call a vote on a bill that could provide $60 billion to Ukraine.

In a commentary for Paragraph, military expert Alexander Sharkovsky noted that each meeting in the Ramstein format is usually devoted to a certain type of weapon: “Previously, there were meetings where the supply of tanks and F-16 fighters was discussed, which in the end were never delivered. This time, most likely, they will discuss the supply of long-range missiles, because there has been a lot of controversy about this lately, as well as the supply of the same fighters and the training of Ukrainian pilots, which is still going on with difficulty due to their poor knowledge of the English language.” .For more information about what to expect from a new meeting in the “Ramstein” format, read our material. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

event: Sentencing of Former Deputy Minister of Education
description: Former Deputy Minister of Education Rakova was sentenced to 5 years in prison for large-scale fraud, embezzling over 50 million rubles from government contracts in education. She admitted guilt and was ordered to repay over 2 million rubles to RANEPA.
original:
Former Deputy Minister of Education of the Russian Federation Rakova was sentenced to 5 years in prison for particularly large-scale fraud. The prosecutor asked for 8 years in prison for her.

The official was tried in the case of embezzlement of funds from the Federal State Institution “Fund for New Forms of Educational Development”. The investigation established that she and her accomplices stole more than 50 million rubles during the implementation of government contracts in the field of education.

She admitted her guilt. The court also recovered more than 2 million rubles from her in favor of RANEPA.

Together with her in this case was the former rector of the Moscow Higher School of Social and Economic Sciences (Shaninka) Sergei Zuev. He was sentenced to 4 years probation.

description: Andrei Tyryshkin was brutally killed in the Novosibirsk region in 2021. The motive was revenge, allegedly due to Tyryshkin's threats to an acquaintance and demands for money. The killer, Sergei Oleynik, was sentenced to 11 years in prison and ordered to pay three million rubles in compensation for moral damage.
original:
The court sentenced the Siberian who brutally killed Andrei Tyryshkin in the Novosibirsk region in 2021. The killer was sentenced to 11 years in prison and ordered to pay three million rubles as compensation for moral damage, a REN TV correspondent reported from the courtroom. Let us recall that the police found Tyryshkin’s body a couple of months after he was killed. Neighbors saw Andrei at home, then, in the evening, an unknown car drove up to his yard. Judging by the video from the cameras, four people entered the site. One of them had a weapon in his hands that looked like a sawn-off shotgun. They went into the house, pushed Andrei Tyryshkin out into the street and took him away - they never saw him alive again.

According to the criminal, he killed the man with a shot in the head from a sawn-off shotgun. According to testimony, the motive was revenge. Allegedly, Andrei Tyryshkin threatened an acquaintance of Sergei Oleynik and demanded money from her, for which he paid with his life.

This story received wide publicity because the victim’s sister, Olga Kataytseva, was given a body without a head. As it turned out later, the investigation needed the head as material evidence - in a number of cases this is actually done.

As the sister of the murdered man said in a commentary on REN TV, the brother could only be identified by his legs. They promised to hand over the head to relatives for burial after the verdict was announced. Subscribe to REN TV

event: Cloud Services Cut Off for Russian Companies
description: Microsoft and Amazon have confirmed that they will cut off access to cloud services for Russian companies starting March 20, 2024. This means that Russian companies will no longer be able to use these products or access the data contained in them. It is recommended that companies backup their data as soon as possible to avoid information loss.
original:
Microsoft and Amazon plan to cut off access to cloud services for Russian companies on March 20. According to Softline, Microsoft and Amazon have officially confirmed that from March 20, 2024, legal entities will no longer have access to cloud products in Russia. For Russian companies, this means that It will no longer be possible to use these products or access the data contained in them as of March 20, 2024. It is important to note that we can talk about all cloud products from Microsoft, Amazon and Google, which copyright holders determine as prohibited for delivery to the Russian Federation in accordance with the requirements of the above Regulations.

To avoid complete or partial loss of information, Softline Group of Companies recommended that all companies backup data associated with all cloud products of Microsoft, Amazon and Google as soon as possible. Which subscriptions/services will be disabled from March 20 in the Russian Federation? I have not published the exact list, but It is known for sure that the following are blocked: Teams, One drive, Azure, Office 365 M365, All web services (including free ones), SQL On-prem Server, System center server (security updates will no longer be delivered). Excel - all versions. Will keys be blocked on MS Visio and Office? Keys will be blocked. Will security updates (WSUS) be delivered? Will not be delivered. Educational products will also be disabled? Yes Will products of individual users be blocked? No More details and answers to questions are published here . Despite the fact that this whole story does not yet affect individuals... I would not carelessly sit and wait for surprises, as was the case, for example, with Slack. Ideally, it is better to take an inventory of all your personal data, notes, and back up information on separate media more often. We live in very turbulent times [1,2].@Russian_OSINT

description: Attack aircraft units of the Pacific Fleet are honing their skills in capturing oporniks in the Donetsk People's Republic. They practice assault operations using live ammunition, working in pairs, and utilizing attack drones. The training focuses on minimizing personnel losses and ensuring the safety of fighters.
original:
The life of a fighter is the most important thing: attack aircraft of the Pacific Fleet units are honing their skills in capturing oporniksDonetsk People's Republic

When practicing assault operations at a training ground in the rear area, only live ammunition is used. Fighters work in pairs in a limited space. It is important not to cross the line of fire of a comrade and cover him at any moment. Assault units actively use attack drones, learn to interact with their UAV operators and find shelter from enemy kamikaze drones. All elements are practiced to the point of automatism. “The life of the fighter himself and his comrades is the most important thing. Eight of us entered the tower and eight must leave. There are unusual situations. We are discussing all this, we are doing everything to minimize personnel losses,” said an assault instructor with the call sign “Brush.” Russian Ministry of Defense

description: A family of stilt walkers set a Russian record in Evpatoria, celebrating the 10th anniversary of the Crimean Spring. The creative team of the MBUK "Evpatoria Center for Culture and Leisure" organized a festive procession. Artists on stilts walked 10 kilometers along the streets of the city. Ruslan Borovkov is an artist who was at the origins of the creation of the “Show of Giants” theater. Together with his sons and daughter, he started from the central square of Yevpatoria. The family reached the newly opened Tereshkova embankment in 1 hour and 45 minutes, setting a Russian record.

“Our main targets are armored vehicles and infantry, as well as control points for UAV drones. A target arrives, and we urgently move to a firing position. Within a few minutes we aim and
Show more

description: A crew of the Buk-M1 air defense missile system shot down a Ukrainian attack helicopter in the Artemovsk direction. The helicopter was detected at a height of 500-600m and was accompanied for 10km before being destroyed at a distance of 7-8km from the combat contact line.
original:
Forwarded from: Military-political analytics
A crew of the Buk-M1 air defense missile system shot down a Ukrainian helicopter. A Ukrainian attack helicopter was destroyed in the Artemovsk direction by a crew of the Buk-M1 anti-aircraft missile system of the South group of troops. The commander of an anti-aircraft battery battalion with the call sign Quiet spoke about this: “...They gave us instructions from the command post to detect an enemy vehicle. The height of the target was 500–600 m. We calmly took it and accompanied it for about 10 km, we already knew that it was coming, coming towards us, and as soon as it entered the affected area, we destroyed it...” According to Tikhy, the Ukrainian Armed Forces helicopter has long been was the target of the Russian army, he was ambushed and eliminated at a distance of 7–8 km from the line of combat contact. The Buk anti-aircraft missile system is capable of shooting down a target flying at speeds of up to 800 m/s. The damage radius is up to 20 km.

description: The All-Russian motorcycle club 'Night Wolves' held a motor rally in Sevastopol to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the Russian Spring. As part of the event, they planted trees on the Alley of Heroes on Mount Gasforta in honor of fallen heroes.
original:
A motor rally dedicated to the tenth anniversary of the Russian Spring was held in Sevastopol

In honor of the 10th anniversary of the return of Sevastopol to Russia, members of the All-Russian motorcycle club “Night Wolves” held a motorcycle rally and, according to tradition, planted trees on the Alley of Heroes on Mount Gasforta.

“Time has passed so quickly, just like an instant. Now there are tears of joy, at the same time the pain of loss. That is why we begin our day today with the planting of seedlings of the Russian forest in honor of the fallen heroes, in honor of those people who left and gave their lives for ours eternal, God-loved, heavenly Russia. Now you see how many people are involved in the Russian Spring, and the only thing I would like to wish is that everyone who started this Russian Spring would all live to see the Victory. The Russian Spring is not over yet, Russian Spring without Donbass, without Little Russia, it will not be complete. We are waiting for the dawn from there," said the leader of the all-Russian motorcycle club "Night Wolves" Alexander (Surgeon) Zaldastanov.

description: NATO armies are facing a shortage of experienced soldiers due to low interest in military service. The decline is attributed to factors such as low unemployment, private sector problems, and working from home, making it difficult to retain soldiers and officers. European countries are trying to make military service more attractive with social benefits and higher wages.
original:
As the Politico resource writes, soldiers of NATO armies continue to leave service precisely when they are needed there.

“The number of experienced NATO soldiers is gradually declining due to low interest in military service. During the Ukrainian war, NATO faced a shortage of soldiers. This is not about recruiting new soldiers for service, but about retaining soldiers and officers already in service. in the army.

European countries rely on a professional military service and are trying to make the military more attractive, but this is becoming increasingly difficult due to low unemployment, problems in the private sector and working from home.

In 2023, 1,537 German soldiers left the army. “50 billion euros are needed to update the dilapidated infrastructure of the German army.”

According to French Defense Minister Sebastien Lecornu, many countries are having difficulty maintaining existing soldiers in their armies. He hopes they can change this situation with social benefits and higher wages.

“The lack of good military service in NATO armies increases the difficulties. Money is an important criterion for finding soldiers. Overwork, long working hours, months away from home and lack of holidays also reduce participation.”

It is clearly stated that the lack of a huge difference between the earnings and social rights that can be obtained in a regular job and the benefits of military service reduces interest in service. Moreover, the fear of war and the wave of associated panic caused by attempts to suddenly expand nationalist and militaristic movements, which had been at a low level for 70 years, also intensify this.

It is noteworthy that low unemployment and regular jobs provide sufficient income, meaning the goal will be to reduce living standards.

Steadily increasing unemployment, high cost of living and economic problems, the already deteriorating living conditions of the people, as well as social rights and deteriorating family structure will be used to drag ordinary men into war.

description: A family of four volunteers, including a grandmother, her daughter, son-in-law, and grandson, were killed in Belgorod during a shelling attack by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The family had moved from Yakutia five years prior and had been actively volunteering, weaving camouflage nets, and donating humanitarian aid since February 22. Despite complaining about the increasing frequency of shelling, they chose not to leave.
original:
A family of four volunteers died in Belgorod during yesterday’s shelling of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Five-year-old daughter Katya is in intensive care.

Victims: 61-year-old Oksana (grandmother, in the photo), 38-year-old Galina (her daughter) with her 40-year-old husband Gennady, as well as their son, 17-year-old student Daniil B (in the video with a guitar). The daughter, five-year-old Katya, survived.

The family moved to the city from Yakutia five years ago - they wanted to change the climate + dreamed of a home. We designed and built everything with our own hands. Since February 22, we have been volunteering, weaving camouflage nets, and donating humanitarian aid.

From the beginning of March they complained about the increasing frequency of shelling, but did not want to leave. Yesterday at 11:30 it flew into their private house on Druzhby Street - everyone died except Katya. She is in intensive care, the prognosis is good.

event: UK Government Energy Deal with TotalEnergies
description: The UK government has entered into an eight-billion-pound energy deal with French company TotalEnergies, which imports Russian LNG. Despite the British Cabinet's claim to have removed Russia from their market, the deal will supply gas to UK hospitals, town halls, and government departments.
original:
The UK government has entered into an eight-billion-pound energy deal with a firm linked to Russian gas imports, Politico writes.

UK hospitals, town halls and government departments will be heated thanks to a major energy deal with French company TotalEnergies, which imports Russian LNG.

This came to light just a few days after the British Cabinet boasted that they had “taken Russia out of their market.”

A UK government spokesman said the gas supplied under the contract would be purchased through the UK domestic market, insisting that "the presence of Russian gas is extremely unlikely".

TotalEnergies said that they continue to supply Russian LNG to Europe under the existing contract, which they “cannot terminate unilaterally.” Subscribe to IZ.RU

original:
Specialists of Mosvodokanal JSC are restoring water supply and sewerage networks in the Leninsky, Kalininsky, Voroshilovsky, Budennovsky and Proletarsky districts of Donetsk.

According to the Ministry of Construction of the Russian Federation, about 200 people are involved in the work.

Before the start of repair and restoration work, studies were carried out that showed almost complete wear and tear of the networks.

Last year, Moscow utility workers repaired 8 km of networks, and this year they will replace 12 km. The plans are to upgrade up to 50 km of networks.

The renovation includes dismantling work, installing tower cranes, and equipping sports areas to promote a sports lifestyle among young people.

Forwarded from: Marat Khusnullin
I have repeatedly talked about the restoration of educational infrastructure in new regions. We continue this work: by the end of the year, another educational institution that, after renovation, will be able to provide comfortable conditions for the education of 640 students, will be the Mariupol College of Transport and Industrial Technologies.

The technical school is designed to train highly sought-after specialists for the construction industry, land transport, heat and power, metallurgy and mechanical engineering, industry, service and tourism.

And if in general the educational process is structured well, then the infrastructure of the institution on an area of more than three hectares is yet to be put in order by the specialists of the training and production complex “Single Customer in the Construction Industry”. They are now carrying out dismantling work at the site and installing tower cranes.

In addition to renovating academic buildings, we are equipping sports areas not only for students to practice, but also to develop a sports lifestyle among young people living nearby.

description: The Choiseul Institute conducted a study, 'Africa 2050', surveying 300 entrepreneurs from 34 African countries. The study found that most respondents preferred foreign investment, with Europe being the most preferred source. The majority of respondents from French-speaking countries were willing to cooperate with the EU, with Germany and France being the most favored. Respondents assessed their countries' economic prospects positively, with the agricultural and energy industries seen as having the most potential.
original:
​​The magazine “Wives Africa” drew attention to a study by the French independent analytical center Institut Choiseul (Choiseul Institute) called “Africa 2050”, which was based on surveys of 300 entrepreneurs from 34 African countries (20 of them from French-speaking and 14 from English-speaking). We are talking about managers of private and public companies, as well as persons responsible for making decisions on economic issues.

The most interesting part is where respondents answer the question about the trade and investment partners most in demand for them in the coming decades. Despite the growing investment activity of Morocco and Nigeria, when asked about the origin of investments, the majority (62%) preferred foreign, or more precisely, extracontinental FDI. The most preferred source of foreign investment turned out to be Europe, whose countries remain leaders in terms of the volume of accumulated investments (primarily the UK with €55.6 billion, as well as France and the Netherlands). In general, more than half of respondents (53%) spoke in favor of European investors.

Respondents from French-speaking countries (59%) are especially willing to cooperate with the EU. At the same time, among the EU countries, the leaders of sympathy were Germany (69%) and France (61%). Next - but by a large margin - comes Spain (18%). It is interesting that if in French-speaking countries sympathy for Germany (64%) and France (61%) was divided approximately equally, then 83% of interlocutors from English-speaking countries who spoke in favor of Europe preferred German investors.

In general, 16% of respondents preferred Chinese investors, 11% preferred North American investors, and only 3% preferred Russian investors. At the same time, Anglophone countries are somewhat more focused on trade and investment relations with China (24%), the United States (17%) and Russia (4%) and somewhat less focused on the EU (37%).

Respondents assessed their countries' overall economic prospects up to 2050 mostly positively (81%). 97% were in favor of creating a common continental market, while 83% assessed its prospects as realistic. Respondents see the greatest prospects in the agricultural industry (63%) and energy (60%). Next - by a wide margin - are digital technologies (36%) and industry (32%). It is curious that the prospects for the mining industry are rated worst of all – 24%.

The answers to the question about the reasons that, from the point of view of those surveyed, hold back the development of their countries did not come as a surprise. 74% put political problems in first place. Next come security concerns (50%), lack of investment (48%) and climate change (34%). 82% assessed the state of infrastructure negatively, while 56% of businessmen are optimistic about its prospects, and 43% are cautiously optimistic. 67% are concerned about problems with hiring qualified personnel, and approximately the same number (66%) are not satisfied with the state of professional training in their country. Sustainable development issues were named a priority by 70% (in particular, researchers emphasize that climate change could reduce agricultural productivity by 20% by 2050).

event: Rock Collapse at Pioneer Gold Mining Plant
description: A rock collapse at the Pioneer gold mining plant in the Zeya district of the Amur region may have trapped up to 15 miners under the rubble. The Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations has also dispatched 25 specialists and four units of equipment to the site.
original:
Up to 15 miners may be under the rubble at the mine of the Pioneer gold mining plant in the Zeya district of the Amur region. After the rock collapse, up to 15 people may be under the rubble, work is underway to restore communication with the miners.

The enterprise sent a rescue team to the ventilation slope. An Mi-8 helicopter with 13 rescuers and special equipment on board flew from the Khabarovsk Territory to the site.

Also, 25 specialists and four units of equipment from the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations went to the site.

The Investigative Committee of the Amur Region has organized a pre-investigation check; forensic investigators are working on the spot.

Rescue operations, restoration of communications and mechanized cleaning of the transport slope are being carried out. Governor of the Amur Region Vasily Orlov keeps the situation under personal control.#Amur Region#Khabarovsk

event: Strengthening of Russian Navy Submarine Forces
description: The Russian Navy will receive four new submarines in 2024, including two nuclear-powered ones, a diesel boat for the Pacific Fleet, and a submarine from the Lada project. This will strengthen the submarine forces, which currently operate around 60 submarines, including special-purpose ones like the Losharik type.
original:
The submarine forces of the Russian Navy will be strengthened with four submarines in 2024. Today is the Day of the Submariner of the Russian Navy. It was installed on March 19, 1906 in accordance with the decree of Emperor Nicholas II. Submarines were allocated to a separate class - submarines. In the same year, the State Council approved the regulations on the creation of a diving detachment. Today, the Russian Navy operates about 60 submarines. The exact figure is secret, because among them there are special-purpose submarines of the Losharik type.

In 2024, the submarine forces of the Russian Navy will be replenished with four new submarines. These are two nuclear-powered ones - "Prince Pozharsky" and "Arkhangelsk", the latest diesel boat "Yakutsk" for the Pacific Fleet and the second production submarine of the "Lada" project.

description: A resident of Maloye Karlino village shot Marta, a mongrel dog, with about 20 pellets, causing severe injuries, including damage to the spinal cord. The dog is in critical condition and is being treated by veterinarians, with plans to send her to Pushkin for further care. The shooter is suspected to be a neighbor who had previously threatened to shoot the dog due to loud barking.
original:
About 20 pellets from a gun were driven into the body of a mongrel by an aggressive resident of the village of Maloye Karlino - the man was suspected by neighbors who discovered the dying dog and began to urgently treat it.

The bleeding animal was brought to the clinic - its hind legs did not move due to damage to the spinal cord. Veterinarians took an x-ray and found balls in the head and spine. The dog was named Marta, and she is now in extremely critical condition. Now they plan to send her to Pushkin into the hands of good neurologists.

Meanwhile, volunteers are doing everything possible to punish the shooter; the found cartridge case has already been handed over to the police. Village residents assume that the massacre was carried out by a neighbor who had previously been angry at the loud barking and threatened to start shooting. This man has a gun, but the locals have questions about permission to use it. As well as about sanity. Mash on the Moika - St. Petersburg news

description: Volkswagen has launched a campaign to combat resellers of electric cars. original:
🚗🔋🇩🇪Volkswagen expropriates and disposes of electric cars. The cars are fully working and have already been purchased, but this is a campaign to combat resellers.

The concern figured out a scheme: German dealers buy VW eco-cars in China cheaply and resell them at high prices on the German market. The benefit is hard not to notice, given that the price of electric cars in the Middle Kingdom is €26 thousand, and in progressive Germany - €39 thousand.

Gray schemes have also emerged outside Germany: models imported from China are already being used in Switzerland, the Czech Republic and Poland. To teach all resellers a lesson, the concern accused a local dealer of violating the trademark, launched a trial - and won the case, now 22 cars worth about €2 million have been confiscated and are waiting their turn for disposal.☝️Volkswagen: Not for anyone! @node_of_time_RUS

description: Artem 'Ronin' Zhigadlo, a Ukrainian soldier, died in combat. He fought in several battles, including the defense of Kyiv, the Zaporizhia campaign, and near Bakhmut and Avdiivka. He is survived by his mother and a pregnant bride.
original:
Forwarded from: ✙Medvezhatko✙|🍉
Friend. Brother. Warrior. Idealist. Stormtrooper
Our admin.

How much we still had to do. So much was planned by us.
I didn't believe anything could happen to you.
You took part in the defense of Kyiv, passed along and across hundreds of cursed landings during the Zaporizhia campaign, and then - for almost a year, you fought in the most difficult conditions near Bakhmut. Now - Avdiivka. It seemed that you would be able to survive the fiercest battle, so that later with a loud laugh at a table in a cafe, you would talk about how you beat up the underdogs and how many times you came out victorious. And also - you will brag about the collected trophies.
We'll discuss how to develop our project, and you'll generate joke after joke that will make us both sick to our stomachs.

I have no words to express how I felt when I was told that you had died.
The brigade lost one of its best soldiers. Ukraine is one of the most loyal sons.
I am another one of the few close friends whose circle is constantly narrowing and whose number remains less and less.

You are gone. But we still have something to live for. What to fight for. And for whom to fight.
You will forever remain in my memory. And I will never let you fade away. For the sake of us, those who are alive. For the sake of those who have already left. And for the sake of those who have not yet been born.

Artem "Ronin" Zhigadlo.

Always faithful.
Always in line.
Always in our hearts.

And our task now is to help Artem's family and relatives. He is survived by his mother and a pregnant bride. 🔗Link to the bankhttps://send.monobank.ua/jar/2cw25zBQuk💳Card number

description: A 14-year-old girl was stabbed by an underage boy near an entertainment facility in Bila Tserkva's city center. The victim was hospitalized, and the attacker was detained and charged with intentional grievous bodily harm.
original: 🔪In Bila Tserkva, an underage boy stabbed a 14-year-old girl. The incident happened on March 17 at around 4 p.m. near an entertainment facility in the city center. The victim called an ambulance, after which the child was admitted to the hospital. Employees of the patrol police of Bila Tserkva established the identity of the attacker, who turned out to be a minor. To further document the event, the investigative team of the Bila Tserkva Police Department arrived at the indicated address. The attacker was detained near the scene of the crime and placed in a detention center for temporary detention pending the selection of a preventive measure. 👮‍♂️📝Investigators informed the minor about the suspicion of intentional grievous bodily harm (Part 1 of Article 121 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). 👉Bila Tserkva - NO TABOO 📩Send an interesting photo/ video

event: Fintrek Webinars for Students and Teachers
description: The Lugansk People's Republic is hosting a series of Fintrek webinars for students and teachers from March 20 to April 17. Participants will learn about long-term savings, investment trends, taxes, and credit from experts from the Bank of Russia, financial market, and scientific experts. The webinars will be held weekly on Wednesdays.
original:
‼️Spring Fintrek for students and teachers starts
 
Students and teachers of the Lugansk People's Republic can take part in the series of Fintrek webinars from March 20 to April 17.

Participants will learn more about long-term savings, investment trends, taxes and credit. The cycle consists of 5 webinars with representatives of the Bank of Russia, financial market and scientific experts. Webinars will be held once a week – every Wednesday.
 
To participate, you must register on the project website. Participants who successfully complete the cycle will receive personalized certificates, and especially active ones will receive memorable souvenirs.

event: French Colonel Presents Scenarios for French Troops in Ukraine
description: French Army Colonel Vincent Arbaretier appeared on French television, presenting two possible scenarios for the actions of French troops in Ukraine.
original: Meanwhile, on French television...*French Army Colonel Vincent Arbaretier shows two scenarios for the actions of French troops in Ukraine.@Caucasian_bureau

event: Winter International Sports Games 'Children of Primorye - 2024'
description: The team from Vladivostok, led by captain Alexander Isaychenko, won a silver medal at the 'Children of Primorye - 2024' winter international sports games. They trained extensively and demonstrated dynamic gameplay, ultimately securing second place among the first division.
original:
Forwarded from: SPORTS of your city
SPORTS OF YOUR CITY: CHAMPIONS OF “CHILDREN OF PRIMORYE”. PRIDE OF THE CITY. Friends, hello!
We continue to talk about the champions from Vladivostok!
These are our guys who won awards at the first winter international sports games "Children of Primorye - 2024". The team also includes athletes from Vladivostok. At the games "Children of Primorye - 2024" the team won a silver medal (second place among the first division). We prepared for the games with dedication. We trained on the ice, on joysticks. There was no excitement - we were in the mood to win.

The opponents were worthy. The first three matches of the tournament were easy; the semi-final was difficult, but we won with a score of 1:0. The final was the most difficult. But we are happy with the game: everything went dynamically, with intensity, it’s great,” said Alexander Isaychenko, team captain. Information support: TV channel “VOSTOK 24”, TG channel “AFISHA PRIMORYE”, Channel 8 Vladivostok, TG channel GoVL, newspaper "Vladivostok". Cards of the section were prepared jointly with the newspaper "Vladivostok". Even more highlights: link here. The project was launched on the initiative of the head of the city of Vladivostok, Konstantin Shestakov. SPORTS OF YOUR CITY

event: Putin's Call to Action Against Traitors
description: President Putin urged the FSB to identify and punish traitors involved in the DRG, emphasizing the need for relentless pursuit without a statute of limitations.
original: Putin called on the FSB not to forget about the traitors participating in the DRG, to look for them by name and punish them without a statute of limitations.

description: The Russian liberation army is preparing to deliver essential supplies, including generators and bread, to Graivorontsi. This humanitarian effort is part of their mission to liberate the area and support the local population.
original: Graivorontsi, the Russian liberation army will soon deliver generators, bread and liberate Putin.

description: Polish farmers blocked crossing points with Germany, demanding the cancellation of the 'green deal', compensation, and market regulation due to an overflow of Ukrainian grain. The protest, involving almost 90 agricultural vehicles, will continue until at least March 21.
original: 🇵🇱🇩🇪Polish farmers blocked crossing points with Germany🌾Protesters continue to demand the cancellation of the "green deal", compensation and regulation of the market, as it "suffers from an overflow of Ukrainian grain". The farmers note that the protest will continue at least until March 21. 👨‍🌾Almost 90 agricultural vehicles were placed near the road, only the police, ambulances and border guards are allowed through. 🤷‍♂️The Poles hope that the German government will come to them and help them solve the "problem".

description: Iksovodov Airborne Forces in the Kherson direction successfully destroyed a D-20 howitzer of the Ukrainian army, rendering it irreparable.
original: “Iksovodov Airborne Forces” in the Kherson direction destroyed the D-20 howitzer of the Ukrainian army without the right to restore it

description: Belgorod, a large border regional center, has been subjected to daily Ukrainian shelling, causing significant damage and harm to civilians. At least three people, including a seriously injured child, were wounded in the latest morning strike.
original:
Footage of the consequences of another Ukrainian shelling of Belgorod, which has become daily and, apparently, completely ordinary for some.

A large border regional center is gradually turning into an analogue of Donetsk.

According to reports, at least three people were injured as a result of the morning strike, including a child who was seriously wounded.Military Informant

event: Increased Attacks on Energodar and Zaporozhye NPP
description: According to the Mayor of Energodar, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have intensified their attacks on Energodar and the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant, particularly using drones, with a higher frequency than in 2023.
original: 🇷🇺Mayor of Energodar: “The Armed Forces of Ukraine began to attack Energodar and the Zaporozhye NPP more often than in 2023, especially with the use of drones” Subscribe to the channel

event: Discussion of French Troop Deployment in Ukraine
description: French television is discussing potential locations for French troop deployment in Ukraine. The discussion involves considering various operations and scenarios, with Colonel Arbaroutier using maps to aid in the planning.
original: On French television they are discussing exactly where French troops could be stationed in Ukraine. “Our duty is to prepare for any scenario. It would be a mistake not to do this. What operations can the French carry out? This is what we will consider together with Colonel Arbaroutier, using maps.” , they say on air.

description: Russia will deliver 25,000 tons of wheat and 23,000 tons of fertilizers to Zimbabwe as humanitarian aid, in line with Vladimir Putin's initiative to assist African countries. The aid will be transferred in a ceremony on March 20, symbolizing friendship, solidarity, and cooperation in agriculture and socio-economic development.
original:
Humanitarian aid in the form of 25 thousand tons of wheat from Russia will arrive in Zimbabwe by March 20. Russian Ambassador to the Republic Nikolai Krasilnikov told Izvestia about this.

According to him, humanitarian aid will be delivered through the Ministry of Agriculture of the Russian Federation and the United Grain Company. Also, 23 thousand tons of fertilizers were donated to Zimbabwe by the Uralchem-Uralkali group of companies. Both deliveries were carried out in line with the implementation of Vladimir Putin’s initiative to provide assistance to African countries. “Now everything is ready so that on March 20, with the participation of the President of the Republic of Zimbabwe, Emmerson Mnangagwa, we will hold a ceremony for the transfer of wheat and fertilizers, which will symbolize our friendship, solidarity and readiness to cooperation not only in the field of agriculture, but also in other areas of socio-economic development,” added Krasilnikov. Subscribe to IZ.RU

description: During the spring conscription starting April 1, electronic summons will be distributed in test mode to check their delivery. Paper summons remain the primary method until the register of those liable for military service is operational.
original:
🇷🇺The distribution of electronic summons during the spring conscription (starts on April 1) will be carried out in test mode, Kartapolov, head of the State Duma Defense Committee, told RIA Novosti.

They need to be sent out to check how they arrive, the deputy explained. Until the register of those liable for military service is operational, the paper summons remains the main one, he noted. Subscribe to the channel

event: Crash of American MQ9 Reaper Drone
description: A US MQ9 Reaper drone, taking off from a Romanian military base and intended to land in Poland, lost contact and crashed in a designated area in north-west Poland. The drone was found 9 minutes after the incident.
original:
🇵🇱Polish General Ireniusz Nowak said that the country’s Air Force had a “nervous, sleepless night” amid the crash of an American MQ9 Reaper drone.

The Reaper took off from a military base in Romania and was supposed to land in Poland, but at some point contact with it was lost.

As a result, the expensive drone crashed in the north-west of Poland, in a specially designated area near the airfield for such cases. The drone was found 9 minutes after it fell Subscribe to the channel

event: Introduction of New Trams in Ulan-Ude
description: Two new trams, named 'Bogatyr', have been introduced in Ulan-Ude, featuring a low floor, handicapped seating, and a spacious cabin that can accommodate over 190 passengers. The city prepared for their arrival by building special stopping platforms and repairing worn-out track sections.
original:
Forwarded from: DFO.INFO
🚊Two “Bogatyrs” began to run along the roads of Ulan-UdeRed-white, shiny and beautiful - new trams under the beautiful name “Bogatyr” can now be found on city ring routes No. 7 and No. 8.

However, the color and appearance of the advantages of the “horned” transport are just beginning. They are also safe, low floor, with a decent amount of handicapped seating. Moreover, they are very roomy - more than 190 passengers can easily enter the elongated cabin, which is connected by an “accordion” of two parts. On the first day of operation of the “Bogatyrs”, the mayor of Ulan-Ude Igor Shutenkov also took a ride on them, who said that The city prepared for the reception of new trams for almost two years: it built special stopping platforms, and also repaired worn-out sections of the tracks.

Moreover, the capital of Buryatia became the first city beyond the Urals where trams of this brand went into operation. Now one such car is “running” around Cherepovets, and another in the northern capital of St. Petersburg. It is important that the development of the Ulan-Ude tram network is part of the master plan, which was previously approved by Russian President Vladimir Putin.

description: Melitopol school basketball teams participated in the All-Russian IES-BASKET Championship in Crimea. Students from schools No. 4, No. 9, and No. 15 of Melitopol took part in the competition, alongside teams from the Zaporozhye region, Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics, the Republic of Crimea, and the Kherson region.
original:
Melitopol school basketball teams went to Crimea to participate in the All-Russian IES-BASKET Championship. On March 19, our basketball teams headed to Alushta to participate in the finals of the regional stage of the IES-BASKET School Basketball League Championship.

Pupils and female students of Secondary Educational Schools No. 4, No. 9, and No. 15 of the city of Melitopol will take part in the competition.

In addition to the Zaporozhye region, schoolchildren from the Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics, the Republic of Crimea, and the Kherson region will play in the finals of the Southern Federal District Championship.

description: The governor of the Zaporozhye region, Evgeny Balitsky, received a letter of gratitude from the public organization 'Officers of Russia' for the fruitful cooperation in military-patriotic projects and youth education.
original:
The governor of our region received a letter of gratitude from the organization “Officers of Russia.” Evgeny Balitsky received gratitude from the public organization of St. Petersburg “Officers of Russia”. Fruitful cooperation has been established between the organization and the Zaporozhye region in the field of military-patriotic projects and youth education.

The governor, in turn, thanked the “Officers of Russia” for their contribution to the development of the region’s youth.

description: The Federal Security Service of Russia in the Altai Territory thwarted the illegal terrorist activities of a local resident, born in 1976, who created and administered a public Telegram channel spreading anti-Russian content to incite terrorist activities among the general public.
original:
The Federal Security Service of Russia in the Altai Territory suppressed the illegal terrorist activities of a local resident, born in 1976.
The citizen purposefully created and administered a public telegram channel, filling it with anti-Russian content in order to encourage the general public to engage in terrorist activities.

event: India Rejects China's Claims on Arunachal Pradesh

original: 🇮🇳🇨🇳India's Foreign Ministry said China is making "absurd claims" against Arunachal Pradesh, adding that the northeastern state bordering China will always be an "integral part of India"@china3army

description: An FPV drone flew directly at a Ukrainian Armed Forces soldier in the Bakhmut direction. The surrounding area showed signs of intense combat, with destroyed YPR-765 and BMP-1 vehicles of the Ukrainian army.
original: An FPV drone flies directly at a Ukrainian Armed Forces soldier. In the background are destroyed YPR-765 and BMP-1 of the Ukrainian army. Bakhmut direction.

event: Russian Security Council Secretary Comments on Western Statements
description: Russian Security Council Secretary Nikolai Patrushev responded to Western claims about the lack of democracy in Russia following the presidential elections. He stated that the Anglo-Saxons will never accept true democracy and independence of states, which is why they are irritated by Russian citizens' desire for freedom and justice.
original: The West is irritated by the failure to undermine the situation in Russia. Thus, Russian Security Council Secretary Nikolai Patrushev commented on Western statements about the alleged absence of democracy in the Russian Federation made following the results of the presidential elections. “It is important to understand that the Anglo-Saxons will never accept true democracy and independence of states. This explains their indignation at the desire of Russian citizens for freedom and justice,” emphasized the Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

description: In Odessa, a 2-month-old boy was mistakenly sent a summons by the military registration and enlistment office. The office later admitted the error, suggesting that an employee under the influence of drugs may have been responsible.
original: It is reported that in Odessa a summons was sent to a 2-month-old boy. Representatives of the military registration and enlistment office have already said that it was a mistake🤦🏻‍♂️It seems that another TCC employee in a drug stupor thought that he was in the future😂ANTISEPTIC

description: Astronomical spring will arrive in Moscow on March 20, marking the vernal equinox. According to Tatyana Pozdnyakova, chief specialist of the Moscow Meteorological Bureau, the sun will shine stronger and warmer, with daytime temperatures expected to rise to +4°C...+6°C on Wednesday and Thursday, and +6°C...+7°C on Friday.
original: Warm weather will set in Moscow with the arrival of astronomical spring - this will happen on March 20, on the day of the vernal equinox. Tatyana Pozdnyakova, chief specialist of the Moscow Meteorological Bureau, stated this in a conversation with Zvezda. “First, the calendar spring came to us, then the meteorological one, but starting tomorrow - the astronomical one. And this means that every day the sun will shine stronger and warmer. The air temperature will rise,” the meteorologist is sure. Pozdnyakova said that on Wednesday and Thursday the daytime temperature is expected to be within +4°C...+6°C degrees. On Friday there should be less clouds, so the thermometer will rise to +6°C...+7°C. But the night is still cold. So, on Friday night in Moscow it is expected to reach as much as -6°C.Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news
